post:
NodePop is running a winter special on our "XL" OpenVZ package.

Nodes are configured with dual Xeon E5430 processors, 16GB of RAM and 15K SAS Drives in raid 10. Each node is connected at 1 Gbps to a 10Gbps pure cogent uplink(for the moment). Amazing speeds along the east coast, to Europe and Canada. High quality brocade network. 7 Day money back guarantee.

XL  
  
2 vCPU’s  
2048 MB Ram  
30 GB disk  
4000 GB bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
1 IPv6  
$7.00/m  
[Order Link](https://billing.nodepop.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=11) Promo: winter
